interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PHOERA 30ml Foundation Liquid Full Coverage 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer (Nude & Buff Beige) with 6ml Makeup Face Primer & Kabuki Foundation Brush Flat Top
Review Date: 2020/09/13
Store: SIGHTLING
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.79 x 1.18 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '779296966696'}
Review Text: I really liked the look and feel of this foundation.  It went on easily for a full coverage smooth look.  I usually use a sponge when applying foundation but I really liked the easy of the brush.  The only downside is that neither color worked.
Review Title: Great coverage
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
AIKIMUSE Eyebrow Pen BRUNETTE AIKIMUSE {'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.58 x 4 x 0.75 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} This product started off promising but after one eye the color stopped coming out. Also the delineation between the four prongs blended into one.
It could have been better but sadly it's not working. Started off good but QIC 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, Fiber Mascara, Waterproof Mascara, Natural Thick Thickening and Lengthening Mascara Lasting All Day, Waterproof, Smudge Proof Eyelashes Joruby {'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Waterproof', 'Brand': 'Joruby', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2 x 1 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} I'm always looking for a good mascara that will make my lashes appear thicker and longer. I thought this product worked well. Some other fiber mascara 's have various steps to achieve this while this is a one step process. I do find d the fiber mascara to be thicker and sticker than traditional mascara 's.
Although this does have a faint odor it worked well Good but a little smelly Purple Hair Mask for Blonde with Keratin & Jojoba Oil - Platinum & Silver Hair - Instantly Eliminate Brassiness & Yellows - Made in USA - Hair Toner - Bleached & Highlighted Hair - Sulfate Free - 8 oz WELLUTION {'Brand': 'WELLUTION', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Dry,Color-treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating Treatment', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.9 x 2.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '749715278440'} I’m outside a lot in the summer and my hair sees a lot of sun and chlorine from the pool. It’s also becoming lighter with more grey. I was excited about trying this. I’ve used it for a few days and adult didn’t notice a huge change in the tone. It does feel somewhat softer though
I’m also not a fan of the packaging. There isn’t a pump or squeeze bottle. You just stick your hand in the jar. Not a change in tone PHOERA 30ml Foundation Liquid Full Coverage 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer (Nude & Buff Beige) with 6ml Makeup Face Primer & Kabuki Foundation Brush Flat Top SIGHTLING {'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.79 x 1.18 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '779296966696'} I really liked the look and feel of this foundation. It went on easily for a full coverage smooth look. I usually use a sponge when applying foundation but I really liked the easy of the brush. The only downside is that neither color worked. Great coverage
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Beauty Product Preferences:** The user's interest in eyebrow enhancement products for a natural finish remains strong, along with a growing focus on mascaras that emphasize ease of use while providing significant volume and length. Their exploration into hair care, particularly products that address brassiness in color-treated hair, continues alongside an emerging appreciation for foundations that deliver full coverage and a smooth finish.

- **Quality Expectations:** The user maintains high standards for product performance, consistently valuing reliability and effectiveness across all categories. They are discerning, providing constructive criticism for underperforming products while also acknowledging effective results.

- **Review Behavior:** The user is balanced in their reviews, thoughtfully noting both the strengths and weaknesses of products. Their recent experience with a foundation showcased their preference for easy application methods, as well as their keen scrutiny regarding color matching.

- **Rating Trends:** The user displays a critical stance, offering mixed ratings when expectations are not met. They are willing to assign high ratings to products that deliver, as indicated by their recent positive review reflecting satisfaction with a product's coverage and ease of use, despite color issues.

Overall, the user's preferences emphasize effectiveness and functionality in their beauty regimen, and they remain committed to providing thorough, balanced feedback across various product categories.
